title: Blythewood Omnium: Presented by Cobblestone Park
Women’s Team Pursuit Talent ID Camp
Greenville Short Track Series
description:
Carolina Triathlon presents the Greenville Short Track Mountain Bike race series.

Riverbend Equestrian Park is a special place to host our 3rd Annual Series and we look forward to a fast course, short descents and tough climbs that will test all levels of racers.

We offer FOUR races for the 2013 season. Special pricing: register for all four for the price of three!

The race format is a .8 mile course of mostly singletrack, racers go for 30 minutes and the most laps win.

There are three races each night:
6:30-6:45 - JUNIORS under 16, a 15-minute version of the race for Juniors with special prizes
6:45-7:15 - Male/Female Sport, Beginner/Intermediate (Cat 2 and 3)*
7:30-8:00 - Male/Female Expert/Pro (Cat 1)*

*Race Director reserves the right to assign racers to either race to balance competition.

The course is a fast .8 mile double and singletrack loop with short descents and tough climbs that will test all levels of racers.

Cash prizes for Male and Female 1st ($25), 2nd ($15) and 3rd ($10) place in Expert/Pro race. Lots of cool swag for top 3 Male/Female in 6:45 race.

This is a USAC permitted event. You must have a valid USAC license to compete. (One-day license available day of event.)
course:
The race format is a fast .8 mile course of double and mostly singletrack with short descents and tough climbs that will test all levels of racers. Racers go for 30 minutes and the most laps win.

 	

Licenses

All racers, including Juniors, MUST have a valid USA Cycling Mountain Bike (XC) License. Current USAC annual license holders must bring their license to check in at Registration. You must include your USA Cycling License Number if you want to receive credit for your performance through USA Cycling.

One-day licenses can be purchased day of the event for $5. One-day race permits are only available to Category 2, Category 3, Singlespeed, Clydesdale and Junior riders.

Bikes

This is a mountain bike short track (dirt crit) race. We are expecting mountain bikes to race it but it you want to race a cyclocross bike we won\'t stop you.
registration: Visit http://go-greenevents.com/GreenvilleShortTrack for additional information and online registration. You can register on-site the day of the race but the fee increases to $15 for race registration. So register online before you arrive to save money!
notes:
There are three races each night:
6:30-6:45 - JUNIORS under 16, a 15-minute version of the race for Juniors with special prizes
6:45-7:15 - Male/Female Sport, Beginner/Intermediate (Cat 2 and 3)*
7:30-8:00 - Male/Female Expert/Pro (Cat 1)*

*Race Director reserves the right to assign racers to either race to balance competition.
directions: The series will take place at Riverbend Equestrian Park, 175 Riverbend Rd, Greenville SC  29617.

title: The Ride 4 Animal Care
description: Charitable ride benefitting Animal Care in Greenville, SC. Proceeds from this event will go to essential animal care services for those that are less fortunate.
course: 20, 43 and 67 mile course to choose from.
registration: Registration opens April 1, 2013 and closes May 31, 2013.

title: 2013 USA Cycling Elite Mass Start Track Nationals
Women’s Team Pursuit Talent ID Camp
Tour de la France Ride
description: Three different distances are sure to fit your skill level and interest - a 15-mile family fun ride, 29-mile scenic course, or 65-mile challenge ride.
course: Rolling course takes you through the Anderson County country-side
registration: Register online at https://www.bikereg.com/Net/20142 Online registration closes on Friday, August 30  @ Noon, but day-of registration will be available starting at 8am and will include a $5 late fee.
